title: How to Make Whisky Log

steps.headline: Melt the butter gently, in a small saucepan.
Add the sugar, egg, and crushed biscuits.
steps.description: Whisk together well until all ingredients are well mixed.

steps.headline: Add the whisky and mix through.
Remove from heat and allow to cool.
Lay the dough onto a layer of plastic wrap to prevent sticking.
steps.description: Form into two logs. Chill in the refrigerator.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Each log should be accompanied by a butter knife for easy slicing of small pieces. For Christmas, add artificial holly and berries to increase the festive appearance.

text: Melt the butter gently, in a small saucepan.  Add the sugar, egg, and crushed biscuits. Whisk together well until all ingredients are well mixed. Add the whisky and mix through.  Remove from heat and allow to cool.  Lay the dough onto a layer of plastic wrap to prevent sticking. Form into two logs. Chill in the refrigerator. Ice with chocolate icing. Chill until serving. Serve. Each log should be accompanied by a butter knife for easy slicing of small pieces. For Christmas, add artificial holly and berries to increase the festive appearance.
